title: Forbidden Forest Ritual Site Adventure #17
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ancient Ritual Clearing
rooms.description: A circular clearing deep in the forbidden forest where moonlight filters through twisted branches. Ancient standing stones form a perfect circle around a weathered altar. Carved totems watch from the shadows, their eyes seeming to follow your movements. The air is thick with the scent of pine and something older, more primal. Moss and vines cover everything.

items.name: weathered stone altar
items.description: A flat stone altar covered in ancient runes and dried herbs
items.text: Inscription: 'Here the Forest Keeper performed the binding ritual in the year 1692. The sacred flame burns eternal in the Heart Oak. Only moonwater can break the forest's seal.'

items.name: hollow fallen log
items.description: A massive rotting log covered in mushrooms and thick moss

items.name: weathered journal
items.description: Ancient pages bound in leather, barely readable
items.text: Journal of the Forest Keeper: I completed the binding ceremony in 1692 during the dark times. The power is sealed within the sacred grove at the Heart Oak. Three truths guard the inner sanctum where the ritual was completed.

items.name: wooden totem pole
items.description: A tall totem carved with animal spirits and forest symbols

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: An old brass key with a leaf pattern engraved on it

items.name: carved stone box
items.description: A heavy box carved with forest symbols and a four digit combination lock

items.name: ancient silver key
items.description: A silver key with a wolf head carved into the handle

items.name: wooden ritual chest
items.description: A chest bound with iron bands and a brass lock

items.name: bundle of sacred herbs
items.description: Dried herbs tied with braided grass, used in ancient rituals

items.name: Forest Keeper's notes
items.description: Detailed notes about the ritual site
items.text: I am the Forest Keeper, guardian of these woods. The ritual site's power flows from the Heart Oak at the grove's center. I have sealed the inner sanctum with three questions. Only one who understands the forest's secrets may enter.

items.name: circle of standing stones
items.description: Twelve ancient stones arranged in a perfect circle, each carved with symbols
items.text: Each stone bears a different symbol: moon, oak, wolf, raven, serpent, stag, bear, owl, fox, boar, crow, and thorn. They mark the boundary of the sacred space.

items.name: overgrown forest path
items.description: A narrow path leading deeper into the sacred grove, barely visible through the undergrowth

rooms.name: Sacred Grove
rooms.description: A mystical grove dominated by an enormous ancient oak tree known as the Heart Oak. Its gnarled roots spread across the forest floor like veins of the earth itself. Fireflies dance in the air, and the sound of distant chanting echoes through the trees. A stone shrine sits at the base of the oak, and vines cover a carved archway to the east.

items.name: Heart Oak tree
items.description: A massive oak tree that must be thousands of years old, its trunk carved with countless symbols
items.text: The carvings tell a story: 'Here burns the sacred flame, eternal heart of the forest. The Forest Keeper tends the fire. The Heart Oak holds all power. Moonwater cleanses and releases.'

items.name: hollow in the oak roots
items.description: A dark hollow between the massive roots of the Heart Oak

items.name: vial of moonwater
items.description: A small glass vial containing water that glows with silvery light

items.name: moss covered shrine
items.description: A small shrine with offerings of flowers and stones at the base of the Heart Oak
items.text: Offerings to the forest spirits. A plaque reads: 'The Forest Keeper protects us. The Heart Oak gives us life. Moonwater purifies our souls.'

items.name: ritual circle
items.description: A circle of stones with ash from ancient fires

items.name: bone talisman
items.description: A talisman carved from bone and hung on a leather cord

items.name: locked offering box
items.description: A wooden box at the shrine with a silver lock

items.name: prophecy scroll
items.description: A scroll describing the ritual's purpose
items.text: The Final Prophecy: When the forest is threatened, the Forest Keeper shall seal its power within the Heart Oak. The sacred flame shall burn eternal in the inner sanctum, protected by three truths that only the worthy may answer.

items.name: vine covered stone archway
items.description: An ancient archway leading to the inner sanctum, covered in thick vines. Three questions are carved into the stone.

password_questions.question: Who guards the forest?
password_questions.hint: Check the journal and notes found around the ritual site

password_questions.question: Where does the sacred flame burn?
password_questions.hint: Read the altar inscription and the Heart Oak carvings

password_questions.question: What breaks the binding?
password_questions.hint: The altar inscription mentions what can break the forest's seal

rooms.name: Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the ritual site! A sacred flame burns in a stone basin at the center of a circular chamber carved from living wood. The walls are covered in glowing runes that pulse with ancient power. Roots from the Heart Oak above form a natural ceiling. The air hums with magical energy. A shaft of moonlight illuminates a path leading upward to freedom.

items.name: eternal sacred flame
items.description: A flame that burns without fuel, glowing with green and silver light

items.name: ritual stone basin
items.description: The basin holding the sacred flame, carved with protective symbols

items.name: ancient glowing runes
items.description: Magical inscriptions covering every surface of the chamber
items.text: The runes tell of the forest's power: 'Here lies the heart of the ancient wood. The ritual is complete. The binding is sealed. The forest endures eternal. The Forest Keeper's work is done.'

items.name: ceiling of oak roots
items.description: Massive roots from the Heart Oak forming a natural dome overhead, pulsing with life energy

items.name: moonlight path
items.description: A shaft of pure moonlight creating a path upward through the roots
items.text: The moonlight forms a stairway leading up through the Heart Oak and out to freedom above.

rooms.win_message: You have reached the inner sanctum and witnessed the sacred flame! The ancient ritual site has accepted your presence. The forest's power flows through you as the moonlight guides you safely up through the Heart Oak and out of the forbidden woods. The mysteries of the ritual site are now yours to keep. You win!
